name: Johan Håstad
content: Johan Håstad Johan Håstad Email: My user name is johanh and this should be followed by the at sign and then kth.se Office phone:+46 8 790 66 91 Address:Mathematics KTH, SE-100 44 Stockholm, Sweden Visiting address:Linstedsvagen 15, floor 6, room 3634 Home address:Karlavägen 28, 5 tr, 114 31 Stockholm Private phone:+46 70 565 5211 I am professor in theoretical computer science the mathematics department at SCI, the school of Engineering Sciences at KTH. The safest way to reach me is by email. Professional activities I am interested in computation complexity and in particular efficent approximation algoritms and circuit complexity. I used to be the chairman for the class of mathematics the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences. This job has, since beginning of 2025 been taken over by Kurt Johansson. I am involved in the center for Cyber defense. I am an editor for the journals Theory of Computing and TheoretiCS. Some links My CV. Some of my papers, available on-line (updated at irregular intervals). Some of my talks, available on-line. An old set of lecture notes on complexity theory (130 pages). An old set of notes for my course "Advanced algorithms". Responsible for this page: <Johan Håstad> Latest change June 20, 2023
